who has consistently had formal or

productive activity?

fields.label:
Does   the   HH   head,   spouse,   or

economically productive activities?

v_required.err: You're required to check the box

fields.label:
Does the household have ANY adult member who has been very sick for at
least three months during the past 12
months?   (This   means   that   the
household head or any adult member
was too sick to work or do normal
activities around the house for at least
three of the past 12 months)

v_required.err: You're required to check the box

interventions

month?

Refer for economic strengthening
and   Government   Livelihood   support
interventions

In the last  month, did any child/
adolescent     in the household or
yourself (if pregnant or HIV-positive)
go   a   whole   day   without   eating
anything   because   there   was   not
enough to eat?

fields.text:
Conduct nutrition
screening   using   mid   upper   arm
circumference  (MUAC) for  child   over   6
months of age up to 5 years old and
pregnant   caregiver;   refer   and   escort
adolescent   and   caregiver     (not
pregnant)  for  Body   Mass   Index   (BMI)
measurement   at   facility;   and   conduct
nutrition counseling and Young Child Feeding
(IYCF) counselling

PROTECTION

fields.label_info_text: Indicate ‘Yes’ by ticking   the appropriate boxes
fields.label:
In the past 6 months, have you or any
child   in   the   household   had   the
following happen to him/her, in or
outside of the household?

options.key: Physical abuse that causes body harm
options.text: Physical abuse that causes body harm

fields.hint: Record obvious issues here

v_required.err: Required

fields.label: Is there any child in this household who… …has not been registered at birth? …does not have a birth certificate or National Identification card?

fields.text:
Conduct   escorted   referral   to   the.appropriate government department (e.g.,
National Registration Office, Department of
Social Welfare)
SUBSTANCE ABUSE

fields.label_info_text: Indicate ‘Yes’ by ticking   the appropriate boxes
fields.label: During the PAST 12 MONTHS, did you do any of the following:

options.key: Drink any alcohol (more than a few sips)
options.text: Drink any alcohol (more than a few sips)?
options.label_info_text:
Do not count sips of alcohol taken during
family or religious events.

options.key: Use anything else to get high?
options.text: Use anything else to get high?
options.label_info_text:
'Anything else' includes illegal drugs, over
the   counter   and   prescription   drugs,   and
things that you sniff or “huff

fields.label_info_text: Indicate ‘Yes’ by ticking the appropriate boxes
fields.label: Since you responded ‘Yes’ to the above question(s)

options.text:
Have you ever ridden in a CAR driven
by someone (including yourself) who was
“high” or had been using alcohol or drugs?

options.key: Do you ever use alcohol or drugs to RELAX, feel better about yourself, or fit in?
options.text:
Do you ever use alcohol or drugs to
RELAX, feel better about yourself, or fit in?
Do you ever FORGET things you did while using alcohol or drugs?

Do your FAMILY or FRIENDS ever tell you
that you should cut down on your drinking or
drug use?

Have you ever gotten into TROUBLE
while you were using alcohol or drugs?

fields.text: Refer for Alcohol and/substance abuse counselling

Provide alcohol and substance abuse counselling in relation to ART Adherence.

NB: ART Adherence must be assessed, and ART adherence counselling provided at every home visit.
